page.title: 16RECREATION/MEDIA GOLDSBORO'
page.content: Most people in our area have hobbies. When we made our survey,we found that {gardening}was most popular with {knitting}and{sewing}a close second. Several people{fish}and go{walking.} Others enjoy{reading}and{watching {video films.}Many travel outside our block for other forms of{Recreation.} {Squash,tennis,snooker,golf}and {badmington}are played in Knaresboro'. Ladies also do{Aerobics}and{Keep fit in Knaresbro'. People go to Harrogate or Wetherby for{swimming.}Watching Cricket at Goldsborough is a popular pastime. Several people use{video libraries, but many more belong to{book libraries A Mobile Library visits the villages. People also use Knaresborough Library. Nearly everyone buys a weekly{magazine and a daily{newspaper}(which has to be collected from the bus shelter).
